general_info.raw_content:
Amity University Dubai
Our vision is to be a world-class university that grooms future leaders and innovators.
Amity University Dubai is a constituent part of the globally renowned Amity Education Group, which has been providing quality education for the last 30 years. With a presence across 11 campuses in India and 13 campuses overseas, Amity is Indiaâ€™s largest private university. 
Amity University Dubai is committed to providing a globally benchmarked education that is relevant to the rapidly changing needs of the world. We aim to foster academic excellence, research, innovation, and entrepreneurship, preparing our students to be leaders and professionals of tomorrow.
We are approved by the Ministry of Education, UAE, and accredited by the Commission for Academic Accreditation (CAA). Our programs are also recognized by the Knowledge and Human Development Authority (KHDA) and the Dubai Health Authority (DHA) for relevant programs.
